name: MazyCity Driving Academy
description:
Drive your car through highway traffic in the the mazy city.It's simple to operate,but it's very difficult to avoid collision and to reach the end.Try to be one of the fastest drivers in the global leaderboards.
KEY FEATURES
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Smooth and realistic car handling
- Different cars to choose from
- An endless stream of single-player content!
- Game Center Leaderboards and Achievements
The game will be updated constantly. Please rate and give your feedback for further improvement of the game.
